synopsis.text: Welcome to Cromartie High School, where the classes are filled with delinquents, misfits, and eccentric characters. Despite not being a troublemaker himself, mild-mannered Takashi Kamiyama ends up enrolled at this notorious school. What follows are Kamiyama's hilarious misadventures as he tries to better the school's reputation, while his wacky classmates are constantly causing mayhem. From a hulking gorilla and a robot named Mechazawa, to a Freddie Mercury lookalike, this ragtag group leads to no shortage of surreal and amusing situations. Kamiyama also participates in strange competitions of toughness with his fellow classmates, vying to move up the ranks of delinquents. Though life at Cromartie is perplexing, one thing's for certain - with classmates like these, there's never a dull day. So strap in for the wild ride that is Cromartie High. You'll get a one-of-a-kind lesson in comedy from its offbeat students. This is one class you definitely don't want to skip.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
